definition: to come down/(completed action marker)/(after verb of motion, indicates motion down and towards us, also fig.)/(indicates continuation from the past towards us)/to be harvested (of crops)/to be over (of a period of time)/to go among the masses (said of leaders)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to accept/to take/next/following
to stop

sentences.english: Blaine stopped to chat with a friend and Guiteau saw his chance.
sentences.chinese: 布莱恩停下来跟一位朋友聊天，吉特奥看到了机会。

sentences.english: He won a few headers and calmed things down.
sentences.chinese: 赢得了几次头球争顶并且使情况稳定下来。

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授讲的话原原本本纪录下来然后记住。

sentences.english: Two jockeys were thrown in the second race.
sentences.chinese: 有两个骑师在第二场赛马时摔了下来。

sentences.english: Yu from East Jiangzhou down to the Three Gorges, Three Gorges will begin dredging project.
sentences.chinese: 禹从江州东下来到了三峡，便开始疏浚三峡的工程。

sentences.english: The preserved Sugar Railway Chi-Shan Station.
sentences.chinese: 被保存下来的糖铁旗山车站。

sentences.english: The four-letter words were always edited out of radio scripts until quite recently.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近广播稿中的庸俗词语才让保留下来。

sentences.english: After that, everybody pelted snowballs at anybody who was riding the sled.
sentences.chinese: 那之后，每个人都对著坐雪橇滑下来的人砸雪球。

sentences.english: The little rain drop slipt from the umbrella to my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 从她伞骨滑下来的小雨点溅在我眼镜玻璃上。

sentences.english: The ground is covered with stiff, dry branches which have rotted off as the trees die.
sentences.chinese: 地上全是硬而干的树枝，都是因树死而凋落下来的。

sentences.english: Andrew's face fell when he was told he couldn' t go on the trip.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁听说他不能去旅游时脸沉了下来。

sentences.english: The name of the eclipsing girl, whatever it was, has not been handed down.
sentences.chinese: 压倒群芳的少女，姓名并未留传下来。

sentences.english: The child lived but had major medical problems including oxygen deprivation and bleeding in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 小孩存活了下来，但患有缺氧及脑出血等严重病症。

sentences.english: Spots of rain had begun to fall.
sentences.chinese: 稀稀拉拉的雨点开始落下来。

sentences.english: This will help on days that you don’t feel like cooking.
sentences.chinese: 这样每天下来你就不会觉得自己在煮饭了。

definition: to go down/to descend/to go on/to continue/(of a servant) to withdraw
to stand up/to get up/also pr. [qi3 lai2]

(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state/indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4])/indicating completion/(after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment/also pr. [qi3 lai5]
to go up
(after a verb, indicates coming out, completion of an action, or ability to discern or detect)
to come out/to appear/to arise
to return/to go back
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
see 過來|过来[guo4 lai2]
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
to return/to come back
rear/back/behind/later/afterwards/also pr. [hou4 mian5]
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
after/then (afterwards)/after that/afterwards
to go out
